name: github-actions
description: ``` name: GitHub Actions Demo run-name: ${{ github.actor }} is testing out GitHub Actions 🚀 on: [push] jobs:   Explore-GitHub-Actions:     runs-on: ubuntu-latest     steps:       - run: echo "🎉 The job was automatically triggered by a ${{ github.event_name }} event."       - run: echo "🐧 This job is now running on a ${{ runner.os }} server hosted by GitHub!"       - run: echo "🔎 The name of your branch is ${{ github.ref }} and your repository is ${{ github.repository }}."       - name: Check out repository code         uses: actions/checkout@v4       - run: echo "💡 The ${{ github.repository }} repository has been cloned to the runner."       - run: echo "🖥️ The workflow is now ready to test your code on the runner."       - name: List files in the repository         run: |           ls ${{ github.workspace }}       - run: echo "🍏 This job's status is ${{ job.status }}."
